name: Fuel Lines
description:
Made for the B&W 2022 Game Jam.

Fuel Lines is a "simple" factory game about feeding fuel to a generator to keep it running. The game gets harder as time goes on and you will need to seek for new ways to fuel the generator. With 3 difficulties (2 of them being almost impossible to beat) you can be sure that you aren't going to die a painful death too often.

If you want to play the Web build you should go to the options menu and click on the fullscreen button until it looks fine.
